TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit UrlAttribute extends System.Runtime.Remoting.Contexts.ContextAttribute
Public NotInheritable Class UrlAttribute Inherits ContextAttribute

summary.span: 定义可在调用站点上用于指定将发生激活的 URL 的特性。

span.span: Defines an attribute that can be used at the call site to specify the URL where the activation will happen.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 激活属性数组作为参数传递给传入创建激活时使用的对象方法。The is passed in the activation attributes array as a parameter to when creating activated objects with the method. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中设置客户端激活远程处理。The following code example illustrates the use of the in setting up client-activated remoting. 此示例包含三个部分： 客户端、 服务器和客户端和服务器使用的远程对象。The example contains three parts: a client, a server, and a remote object that is used by the client and server. 下面的代码示例演示了客户端：The following code example shows a client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/client.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/client.cs#0)] 下面的代码示例显示了为此客户端的服务器：The following code example shows a server for this client: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/server.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/server.cs#2)] 下面的代码示例演示使用客户端和服务器的远程对象：The following code example shows the remote object that is used by the client and the server: [!code-cpp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CPP/remoteobject.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Runtime.Remoting.Activation.UrlAttribute/CS/remoteobject.cs#3)]

summary.span: 强制在指定 URL 处的上下文内创建上下文和服务器对象。

span.span: Forces the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不影响到新的上下文的任何属性，因为它由远程处理基础结构来强制上下文和在指定的 URL 处的上下文内的服务器对象的创建。 does not contribute any properties to the new context because it is used by the remoting infrastructure to force the creation of the context and the server object inside the context at the specified URL.
